frontmatter.title: Dynamic OG images for your Gatsby blog
frontmatter.description: So this website is built using GatsbyJS, which is super cool and super easy to get started. It took just one week for me to set this all up. This is the 6th blog post here on this website and if you try sharing this blog post on the internet you would see a image with the title. This image is called the OG image. Click to read more...
